game.name: ARCTIC CTHULHU
game.categories: Single-player, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Arctic Cthulhu is a retro horror game where you control an all-terrain vehicle in the heart of the frozen Arctic.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Arctic Cthulhu is a retro horror game where you control an all-terrain vehicle in the heart of the frozen Arctic.
